name: Fatal Evidence: The Missing
summary: Your best friend’s bad luck takes a disastrous turn when his wife goes missing. Just when things seem like they can’t get any worse, he’s arrested for her kidnapping! But this is no open and shut case, and you quickly find evidence of foul play. The question is, who would want to frame your friend and why? It’s up to you to crack the case and clear his name before it’s too late. Do you have what it takes? Find out in this riveting Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!
